titles.title: Come On Brother And Walk With Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come on brother and walk with me,
I need you and you need me.
Down this road of life I see,
God's great plan of harmony.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh ven hermano, camina conmigo,
Te necesito y tu me necesitas.
En este camino de vida vemos,
El gran plan de la unidad.
